means: 使气馁( discourage的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They are discouraged from becoming close friends with foreigners.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们被劝说不要和外国人密切交往。

sentence.Network_en: Early marriage and procreation are no longer discouraged there.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里不再反对早婚早育。

sentence.Network_en: She was determined not to be too discouraged.

PerfectNetExp.abs: I ' t get discouraged because I know that true satisfaction comes from a good day ' s work ., 我并不泄气 , 因为我知道真正的满足来自于每一天出色的完成工作.
i was too much discouraged by this failure to try again ., 这一失败使我太灰心了 , 我不想再尝试了.

list.abs: bing词典——英语部落格 - 人人小站 ... Present value： 现值 Discouraged workers： 丧失信心的工人 Disposable income： 可支配收 …
失去信心的工人（discouraged workers）是游荡在劳动力市场边缘的人员中的一部分，他们因就业市场不景气而暂时没有寻找工作。 …
所谓的沮丧劳工(discouraged worker)指的是原本没有工作想要找工作，但放弃找工作者因此，按照我们上面的定义~他们应该归于非 …
discovery　 探查打法discouraging card　 非鼓励牌distribution　分配（牌型）
请问气氛的“氛”是平声还是仄声？_百度知道 ... 气度[ bearing] 气短[ be discouraged] 气短[ breathe hard;short-winded].

entry.def: If someone or something discourages you, they cause you to lose your enthusiasm about your actions.

example.ex: It may be difficult to do at first. Don't let this discourage you.
example.tran: 万事开头难，别因此而灰心。

entry.def: To discourage an action or to discourage someone from doing it means to make them not want to do it.

example.ex: ...typhoons that discouraged shopping and leisure activities.
example.tran: 使购物和休闲活动化为泡影的台风

example.ex: ...a campaign to discourage children from smoking.
example.tran: 劝阻儿童远离香烟的运动

sentences.sentence: "felt discouraged by the magnitude of the problem"
"the disheartened instructor tried vainly to arouse their interest"
"the accident left others discouraged about going there"

auth_sentence.content: Reger's father strongly discouraged him from going ahead.
auth_sentence.res_content: Reger's father strongly discouraged him from going ahead.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reger's father strongly discouraged him from going ahead.

auth_sentence.content: Don't get discouraged when dealing with tax officials.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't get discouraged when dealing with tax officials.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't get discouraged when dealing with tax officials.

auth_sentence.content: Industry experts say inconsistent government policies have discouraged investors.
auth_sentence.res_content: Industry experts say inconsistent government policies have discouraged investors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Industry experts say inconsistent government policies have discouraged investors.

Sentence.sentence: The research argued that boys often perform badly in mixed schools because they become discouraged when their female peers do better earlier in speaking and reading skills.
But children are frequently discouraged from involvement with natural spaces, for health and safety reasons, for fear that they might get dirty or that they might cause damage.

means.word_mean: 灰心的;沮丧的;气馁的;泄气的

sentences.en: A spell of tough luck discouraged him.
sentences.cn: 一段时间的厄运使他失去了勇气。

sentences.en: All her strength drained out when she was discouraged in what she was doing.
sentences.cn: 当做事遇到挫折时,她所有的劲头也就丢光了。
